title: The Inbetween
description: It was the time they call the inbetween. When trees raise bare and withered arms to keening skies. When wild fowl move like grey shades over leaded waters. The time when the lord of the green has long gone to the summer land and he who they call the winter king rides out from the land of shadows with death on his helm and a sword of ice in his hand.Arwyn has lived long and knows much and knows well the power of the inbetween, but the future was ever a canvas painted by the past! Short story 5,000 words plus.
author: Sue  Kendrick
